title: Is Istikhara valid if I have not memorized the Dua and read it from a book instead? Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: fazana from australia she says um is the estejara still valid when i don't memorize the dua but i read it from a book the answer is 100 it is still valid not everybody can memorize the dua especially non-arabs so if you pray the two raka's you finish and you open the booklet and you read the dua this is totally legit
